subtitle: These simple but mouthwatering kebabs are bound to be popular at any barbecue.

method.text: Place the prepared turkey in a shallow dish. Mix the marinade ingredients together. Pour over the turkey. Marinate for 1 days in the fridge, turning meat occasionally.
Thread turkey cubes onto small skewers (2 per person). Grill under a medium preheated grill or on a hot barbecue for 7-8 min, turning skewers frequently and brushing with reserved marinade.
Fold lemon or lime slices in half. Thread one through the layer of pith, onto the end of each skewer.

title: Grilled turkey kebabs
